metadata.title: CVE-2023-28746 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Information exposure through microarchitectural state after transientexecution from some register files for some Intel(R) Atom(R) Processors mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosurevia local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
